page.title: 18CAMBERLEY POLICE.
page.content: Of 90{police}stationed at Camberley, 2-4 officers patrol the Old Dean, Frimley, St.Paul's & Bagshot sections. The St.Paul's section, being a richer area, suffers from{domestic burglary}& so does Bagshot.{Theft}of & from motor vehicles occurs here, in the Old Dean} & Frimley. The Old Dean, being a council estate, suffers from petty {vandalism.Mugging}& assault rarely occurs in Camberley.{Burglaries,}of which 90% happen during the day,are now decreasing. On average 41 people get arrested each weekmost of whom stay in a cell for 3-4 hours, some stay longer.Weekends are busiest after pub closing time. There are 4 police cars, 3 CID cars & 2 vans stationed at Camberley. Police are called out at least 5 times daily for{road accidents}of which about 12 were fatal last year.
